title: Search and Destroy
description: If you come to kill Tom Rollins, you better not miss. Honduran cartel leader, Oscar Zavala, has escaped from the Mexican prison where he’s been serving a life sentence. And now he wants to take revenge on the men who put him there – Tom Rollins and his former black ops unit.Oscar sends a team to the US. Their mission – to take Rollins alive and bring him back to Honduras where he can be tortured and killed.This first team fails, but Tom knows Oscar will never give up. There will be other teams and Tom and the people he loves will never be safe.A fear that is confirmed when Zeke, another member of Tom’s old unit, and his family are drawn into the conflict.Tom realizes they have no choice, they have to bring the fight to the enemy. By going to Honduras and facing Oscar and his entire cartel in what may be the deadliest battle Tom has ever fought…Search and Destroy - Book 10 in the superb Tom Rollins action thriller series. Perfect for fans of Lee Child, Jason Kasper & David Archer.What readers are saying about Search and Destroy:“This is another thrilling page-turner and the title is very apt. I can't wait for the next one to see what Tom gets involved in.” -Booksprout Reviewer“Action-packed throughout, so you’ll want to keep those pages turning.” -Netgalley Reviewer“…another great fast paced thriller about ex-CIA operative Tom Rollins. Heatley is a great storyteller…” -Netgalley Reviewer“A fabulous tale that I was unable to put down until I had finished it. A rollercoaster ride from Paul Heatley. This author gets better and better, and he was already excellent. 5 stars.” -Netgalley Reviewer
author: Paul Heatley
